title: Exploration of Energization and Radiation in Geospace (ERG) Extremely High-Energy Electron Experiment (XEP) Level 2 extremely high energy electron data - Nana Higashio (Space Environment Group, Aerospace Research and Development Directorate, Tsukuba Space Center, Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency, 2-1-1 Sengen, Tsukuba, Ibaraki 305-8505, Japan)

info.contact: Nana Higashio @ Space Environment Group, Aerospace Research and Development Directorate, Tsukuba Space Center, Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency, 2-1-1 Sengen, Tsukuba, Ibaraki 305-8505, Japan

parameters.name: FEDO_SSD_T
parameters.description: ---> Omni-directional flux of XEP SSD (overlaid time series). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['FEDO_SSD']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.
